description:
As an HR admin
  I want to navigate through the system and add new employees
  So that I can manage employee records effectively

elements.name: Add new employee with required fields

steps.name: I open the login page for add employee
I enter username "Admin" and password "admin123" for add employee
I click the login button for add employee
I navigate to PIM module
I click on Add Employee
I fill in the required employee details
I click the save button for add employee
the employee should be successfully added

name: Employee Management in OrangeHRM

steps.name: I open the login page for admin navigation
I enter username "Admin" and password "admin123" for admin navigation
I click the login button for admin navigation
I search for "Admin" for admin navigation
I click profile button for admin navigation
I click logout for admin navigation
I should be redirected to login page for admin navigation
I open the login page for admin navigation
I enter username "Admin" and password "admin123" for admin navigation
I click the login button for admin navigation
I click on Admin menu for admin navigation
I click Add button for admin navigation
I click Cancel button for admin navigation
I click profile button for admin navigation
I click logout for admin navigation
I should be redirected to login page for admin navigation

description:
As an employee
  I want to search applied leaves and define leave periods
  So that I can manage the leave requests

elements.name: Successfully search for applied leaves with valid inputs

steps.name: I am logged in as an admin user for applyLeave
I navigate to the leave application page for applyLeave
I enter from date "2022-01-01" for applyLeave
I enter to date "2024-01-01" for applyLeave
I select leave type "taken" for applyLeave
I click the leave search button for applyLeave
I should see the leave requests in the list or a message indicating there are no records to show for applyLeave
I am logged in as an admin user for applyLeave
I navigate to the define leave period page for applyLeave
I select start month "March" for applyLeave
I select start date "05" for applyLeave
I click the save button for applyLeave
I should see the end date "March 04 (Following Year)" for applyLeave

name: Leave Function

description:
As an HR admin
  I want to navigate through the system and view employee timesheets
  So that I can manage time records effectively

steps.name: I open the login page for timesheet management
I enter username "Admin" and password "admin123" for timesheet management
I click the login button for timesheet management
I navigate to Time module for timesheet management
I search and select employee name "savina dulvin dulvin" in the timesheet search bar
I click the view button for the selected employee
I should be redirected to the employee's timesheet page with a valid URL
I open the login page for timesheet management
I enter username "Admin" and password "admin123" for timesheet management
I click the login button for timesheet management
I navigate to Time module for timesheet management
I click the "View" button in the "Timesheets Pending Action" box
I should be redirected to the pending timesheet page with a valid URL

name: Employee Timesheet Management in OrangeHRM

description:
As an admin user
  I want to manage job vacancies
  So that I can add and search for job vacancies

elements.name: Successfully add a new vacancy with valid inputs

steps.name: I am logged in as an admin user for manageVacancies
I select the recruitment tab for manageVacancies
I navigate to the vacancies page for manageVacancies
I click the add button for manageVacancies
I enter Vacancy Name as "QA Architect" for manageVacancies
I select Job Title as "Payroll Administrator" for manageVacancies
I enter Description as "Require 10 + experience" for manageVacancies
I enter Hiring Manager as "Ranga Akunuri" for manageVacancies

description:
As an HR admin
  I want to reset the fields in the PIM search form
  So that I can clear the search criteria and start a new search

steps.name: I open the login page for reset fields
I enter username "Admin" and password "admin123" for reset fields
I click the login button for reset fields
I should be redirected to the dashboard for reset fields
I navigate to PIM page for reset fields
I select Full-Time Permanent from employment status for reset fields
I click the PIM search button for reset fields
I should see the filtered results for Full-Time Permanent employees for reset fields

elements.name: Search employee by name and ID then reset

steps.name: I open the login page for reset fields
I enter username "Admin" and password "admin123" for reset fields
I click the login button for reset fields
I should be redirected to the dashboard for reset fields
I navigate to PIM page for reset fields
I enter employee name "Nishara" for reset fields
I enter employee ID "0038" for reset fields
I click the PIM search button for reset fields
I should see the search results for reset fields
I click the reset button for reset fields
the search fields should be cleared for reset fields

name: Reset Fields Dropdown in OrangeHRM
